tldr: Affected versions of this package may expose sensitive information because source file paths or URIs containing tokens are logged without proper sanitization, potentially revealing data that should remain confidential.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version which is within vulnerability ranges
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `snakemake` library to a patch version.
vulnerable_to: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File
